title: The Effects of the Great Recession on Central Bank Doctrine and Practice
content: For release on delivery  1:15 p.m. EDT   October 18, 2011    The Effects of the Great Recession on Central Bank Doctrine and Practice    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     56th Economic Conference     Federal Reserve Bank of Boston     Boston, Massachusetts    October 18, 2011
